pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===================Project description===================**Python version must be greater than 3.7.1***Based on the package*- pika>=0.13.1- requests>=2.20.0- DBUtils>=2.0- cx_Oracle>=7.1.1- redis-py-cluster>=1.3.4- pymongo>=3.8.0- pymysql>=0.9.3- six>=1.12.0- kafka-python>=1.4.6- logstash-formatter>=0.5.17- kombu>=5.0.2**reStructuredText(rst) Quick start:** https://www.jianshu.com/p/1885d5570b37**To view more go to github**
